db:abstract.db:para: The Spreadsheet example shows how to create a simple spreadsheet application.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets requires(qtConfig(treeview)) qtHaveModule(printsupport): QT += printsupport #unix:qtHaveModule(dbus): QT += dbus widgets
HEADERS += printview.h spreadsheet.h spreadsheetdelegate.h spreadsheetitem.h SOURCES += main.cpp \ printview.cpp \ spreadsheet.cpp \ spreadsheetdelegate.cpp \ spreadsheetitem.cpp RESOURCES += spreadsheet.qrc
build_all:!build_pass { CONFIG -= build_all CONFIG += release }
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/widgets/itemviews/spreadsheet INSTALLS += target
